results.title: The Good Fight
results.brief_description: Picking up one year after the events of the final broadcast episode of “The Good Wife”, an enormous financial scam has destroyed the reputation of a young lawyer, Maia Rindell, while simultaneously wiping out her mentor and godmother Diane Lockhart’s savings. Forced out of her law firm, now called “Lockhart, Deckler, Gussman, Lee, Lyman, Gilbert, Lurie, Kagan, Tannebaum & Associates”, they join Lucca Quinn at one of Chicago’s preeminent law firms.
results.description: Picking up one year after the events of the final broadcast episode of “The Good Wife”, an enormous financial scam has destroyed the reputation of a young lawyer, Maia Rindell, while simultaneously wiping out her mentor and godmother Diane Lockhart’s savings. results.title: The Golem
results.brief_description: Der Golem (The Golem) is a 1915 German silent horror film, partly lost, that was written and directed by Paul Wegener and Henrik Galeen, and inspired by the ancient Jewish legend.

constellations_other.name: Shadowplay and spookiness
constellations_other.description: Silhouettes and shadows scare up some of the most sinister creatures in cinema and videogames.

results.description: This mostly lost film (please check your attic) is often confused with director Paul Wegener third and readily available interpretation of the legend; Der Golem, wie er in die Welt kam (1920). In this version of the golem legend, the golem, a clay statue brought to life by Rabbi Loew in 16th century Prague to save the Jews from the ongoing brutal persecution by the city’s rulers, is found in the rubble of an old synagogue in the 20th century. Brought to life by an antique dealer, the golem is used as a menial servant. Eventually falling in love with the dealer’s wife, it goes on a murderous rampage when its love for her goes unanswered.
description_for_label: This mostly lost film (please check your attic) is often confused with director Paul Wegener third and readily available interpretation of the legend; Der Golem, wie er in die Welt kam (1920). In this version of the golem legend, the golem, a clay statue brought to life by Rabbi Loew in 16th century Prague to save the Jews from the ongoing brutal persecution by the city’s rulers, is found in the rubble of an old synagogue in the 20th century. Brought to life by an antique dealer, the golem is used as a menial servant. Eventually falling in love with the dealer’s wife, it goes on a murderous rampage when its love for her goes unanswered.

results.title: The Godfather: Part II
results.creator_credit: Paramount, The Coppola Company, Francis Ford Coppola, Gray Frederickson, Fred Roos, Dean Tavoularis, Mona Skager and Theadora Van Runkle
results.headline_credit: United States and United States of America, 1974
results.brief_description: Both a prequel and sequel to The Godfather, Francis Ford Coppola’s follow up continues the modern-day tale of Don Michael Corleone (Al Pacino), alongside the story of young Vito Corleone (Robert De Niro) fleeing Italy and making his way through the mafia.

constellations_other.name: Evolution of colour
constellations_other.description: From stenciling film frames through to the survival of Technicolor after Hollywood stopped using it, this Constellation links early cinema to some of the world's greatest films.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Paramount, The Coppola Company, Francis Ford Coppola, Gray Frederickson, Fred Roos, Dean Tavoularis, Mona Skager and Theadora Van Runkle
results.headline_credit_for_label: United States and United States of America, 1974
results.description: In the continuing saga of the Corleone crime family, a young Vito Corleone grows up in Sicily and in 1910s New York. In the 1950s, Michael Corleone attempts to expand the family business into Las Vegas, Hollywood and Cuba.
description_for_label: In the continuing saga of the Corleone crime family, a young Vito Corleone grows up in Sicily and in 1910s New York. In the 1950s, Michael Corleone attempts to expand the family business into Las Vegas, Hollywood and Cuba.

results.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
results.creator_credit: Det Danske Filminstitut, Nordisk Film, ZDF, Yellow Bird, Film Capital Stockholm, Spiltan Underhållning, Nordisk Film & TV Fond, Svenska Filminstitutet, SVT, Film i Väst, Niels Sejer, Søren Stærmose, Niels Arden Oplev, Cilla Rörby, Nikolaj Arcel and Rasmus Heisterberg
results.brief_description: Swedish thriller based on Stieg Larsson’s novel about a male journalist and a young female hacker. In the opening of the movie, Mikael Blomkvist, a middle-aged publisher for the magazine Millennium, loses a libel case brought by corrupt Swedish industrialist Hans-Erik Wennerström. Nevertheless, he is hired by Henrik Vanger in order to solve a cold case, the disappearance of Vanger’s niece

constellations_other.name: Collective: investigative journalism on screen
constellations_other.description: In Collective, documentarian Alexander Nanau follows a team of journalists who uncover a far-reaching government conspiracy following a deadly nightclub fire in Romania that kills dozens.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Det Danske Filminstitut, Nordisk Film, ZDF, Yellow Bird, Film Capital Stockholm, Spiltan Underhållning, Nordisk Film & TV Fond, Svenska Filminstitutet, SVT, Film i Väst, Niels Sejer, Søren Stærmose, Niels Arden Oplev, Cilla Rörby, Nikolaj Arcel and Rasmus Heisterberg

Nevertheless, he is hired by Henrik Vanger in order to solve a cold case, the disappearance of Vanger’s niece

results.title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
results.creator_credit: Happinet Pictures, Kadokawa, Memory Tech, Q-Tec, Toki wo Kakeru Shôjo Seisaku Iinkai 2006, Madhouse, Sound Box, Kadokawa Shoten, Takafumi Watanabe, Jungo Maruta, Mamoru Hosoda, Yuichiro Saito and Satoko Okudera
results.brief_description: When 17-year-old Makoto Konno gains the ability to, quite literally, “leap” backwards through time, she immediately sets about improving her grades and preventing personal mishaps. However, she soon realises that changing the past isn’t as simple as it seems, and eventually, will have to rely on her new powers to shape the future of herself and her friends.

constellations_other.name: Obviously the time continuum has been disrupted...again and again and again!
constellations_other.description: Eadweard Muybridge was able to capture time and play it back again creating endless time paradoxes where subjects are destined to repeat their previous actions. Filmmakers have since explored such notions via time travel narratives questioning destiny, fate and choice.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Happinet Pictures, Kadokawa, Memory Tech, Q-Tec, Toki wo Kakeru Shôjo Seisaku Iinkai 2006, Madhouse, Sound Box, Kadokawa Shoten, Takafumi Watanabe, Jungo Maruta, Mamoru Hosoda, Yuichiro Saito and Satoko Okudera

creators_primary.name: Toki wo Kakeru Shôjo Seisaku Iinkai 2006

results.title: The Gang's All Here
results.creator_credit: William LeBaron, Fred Sersen and Yvonne Wood
results.brief_description: Playboy Andy Mason, on leave from the army, romances showgirl Edie Allen overnight to such effect that she’s starry-eyed when he leaves next morning for active duty in the Pacific. Song and dance hilarity follows.

constellations_other.name: Dancing on a dream
constellations_other.description: Mechanical lantern slides called chromotropes created wondrously complex patterns of light through sliding glass panels and internal gears.

results.creator_credit_for_label: William LeBaron, Fred Sersen and Yvonne Wood
results.description: Playboy Andy Mason, on leave from the army, romances showgirl Edie Allen overnight to such effect that she’s starry-eyed when he leaves next morning for active duty in the Pacific. Only trouble is, he gave her the assumed name of Casey. Andy’s eventual return with a medal is celebrated by his rich father with a benefit show featuring Eadie’s show troupe, at which she’s sure to learn his true identity…and meet Vivian, his ‘family-arrangement’ fiancée. Mostly song and dance.
description_for_label: Playboy Andy Mason, on leave from the army, romances showgirl Edie Allen overnight to such effect that she’s starry-eyed when he leaves next morning for active duty in the Pacific. Only trouble is, he gave her the assumed name of Casey. Andy’s eventual return with a medal is celebrated by his rich father with a benefit show featuring Eadie’s show troupe, at which she’s sure to learn his true identity…and meet Vivian, his ‘family-arrangement’ fiancée. Mostly song and dance.

results.title: The Fifth Estate
results.creator_credit: Participant, Reliance Entertainment, Touchstone Pictures, Anonymous Content, DreamWorks Pictures, Steve Golin, Bill Condon, Michael Sugar, Josh Singer, Mark Tildesley and Shay Cunliffe
results.headline_credit: Belgium, India and United States of America, 2013
results.brief_description: A look at the relationship between WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange and his early supporter and eventual colleague Daniel Domscheit-Berg, and how the website’s growth and influence led to an irreparable rift between the two friends.

constellations_other.name: The entire history of you
constellations_other.description: Bellingcat is a journalism collective using social media platforms and surveillance footage for their investigations.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Participant, Reliance Entertainment, Touchstone Pictures, Anonymous Content, DreamWorks Pictures, Steve Golin, Bill Condon, Michael Sugar, Josh Singer, Mark Tildesley and Shay Cunliffe

results.title: The Family Law
results.brief_description: Through the eyes of 14-year-old Benjamin, and set over the course of a long, hot, Queensland summer, the Law family navigate a series of sometimes disastrous events which become memorable milestones, and serve as a reminder that at the end of the day family can sometimes feel more like a sentence than a choice.
results.description: Through the eyes of 14-year-old Benjamin, and set over the course of a long, hot, Queensland summer, the Law family navigate a series of sometimes disastrous events which become memorable milestones, and serve as a reminder that at the end of the day family can sometimes feel more like a sentence than a choice.

results.title: The Eye of the Storm
results.brief_description: In a Sydney suburb, two nurses, Maria and Flora, a housekeeper, Lotte, and a solicitor, Arnold, attend to Elizabeth Hunter as her expatriate son Sir Basil, a famous but struggling actor in London, and daughter Dorothy, a divorced and down at heel princess, convene at her deathbed. They come to make sure they can leave Australia with their hefty inheritance.

constellations_other.name: Page to screen
constellations_other.description: Australian scribes and screenwriters unite on the silver and small screens.

results.description: In a Sydney suburb, two nurses, Maria and Flora, a housekeeper, Lotte, and a solicitor, Arnold, attend to Elizabeth Hunter as her expatriate son Sir Basil, a famous but struggling actor in London, and daughter Dorothy, a divorced and down at heel princess, convene at her deathbed. They come to make sure they can leave Australia with their hefty inheritance.

They come to make sure they can leave Australia with their hefty inheritance.

results.title: The Dressmaker
results.brief_description: In 1950s Australia, beautiful, talented dressmaker Tilly returns to her tiny hometown to right wrongs from her past. As she tries to reconcile with her mother, she starts to fall in love while transforming the fashion of the town.

constellations_other.name: Atari’s Basketball
constellations_other.description: Released in 1979, just in time for the arcade heydays of the early 1980s, Atari’s Basketball was the first basketball game to use a trackball as the input mechanic and a 45-degree angled side view. This set the standard for basketball games that followed.

constellations_other.name: Judy and Punch and many more
constellations_other.description: Women have been oppressed by patriarchal conventions and by men under the guise of the supernatural throughout history, but recent moving-image works are reframing these historical persecutions.

results.description: In 1950s Australia, beautiful, talented dressmaker Tilly returns to her tiny hometown to right wrongs from her past. As she tries to reconcile with her mother, she starts to fall in love while transforming the fashion of the town.
